this_title: The 101 Events That Made The Twentieth Century
trans_title: 塑造20世纪的101个重大事件
introduction: The history of mankind is a never-ending story of change, revolution, and evolution, but surely no span of a hundred years can claim to have changed the world so dramatically as the Twentieth Century. In this series we examine the 101 Events which, in the judgment of experts, including those who contribute to the series, most influentially shaped the century, our world, and our...
chinese_title: 塑造20世纪的101个重大事件
foreign_title: The 101 Events That Made The Twentieth Century
